mods.abstract: Image of shins and feet against a spongy textured dark background. Legs have horizontal stripes ending above the ankle. The striped patterns end with a spiral decoration with fringe or tassels attached which hang down towards the feet. The feet are long and angular.

name.namePart: Louisiana State University (Baton Rouge, La.). Museum of Art
